parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries returned per page. Default value: **20**. Maximum value: **100**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the Enterprise Edition transit router is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The information about the tag.

You can specify at most 20 tags in each call.

parameters.name: TransitRouterAttachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the inter-region connection.

parameters.name: TransitRouterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Enterprise Edition transit router.
